name: Pachinko Platformer
description:
NOTICE:

This is a simple prototype game I made for a project in college. As such, the game will be unfinished and lacking in a few places. HOWEVER, this doesn't shield my game from criticism, and any constructive criticism is welcome to me.

Thank you.

Welcome to the Pachinko Platformer! Tumble, spin, and fly as you collect all five of the coins. Afterwards traverse to the bottom of the  bonus level to collect as many coins as you can and reach the giant emerald waiting below.
